DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the: - Natural history of calcification posttransplantation - Natural history of BMC following renal transplantation - Reverse correlation between calcification score and aortic calcifications following renal transplantation - Correlation of IMT, BMC, PWV and biochemical variables - Correlation of IMT, BMC, PWV, biochemical variables and outcome - Predictors of CV disease after transplantation - Predictors of IMT progression, BMC loss and PWV progression after renal transplantation
DOC.brief_title: Arterial Stiffness and Calcifications in Incident Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Incident renal transplant patients or combined renal/pancreas transplant patients
